entry.title: 3M AB40241 - 3M Cloth Spiral Band 341D, 3/4 in x 1-1/2 in, 80 X-weight, 100 per case AB40241 7100093316
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 0.46

[shortdesc]

3M Cloth Spiral Band 341D, 3/4 in x 1-1/2 in, 80 X-weight, 100 per case

  • The 3M™ Cloth Band 341D is a spiral band or short tube that conforms to inner and outer contours for sanding and shaping
  • This band's fast-cutting aluminum oxide abrasive grains are resin-bonded to a durable cloth backing to help provide fast continuous cut and long-life performance
  • The 3M™ Cloth Band 341D is a versatile product that can be used for grinding to remove parting lines or seams, imperfections, and burrs.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Tube-shaped band fits inner and outer contours to remove parting lines, imperfections, and burrs
  • X-weight cloth backing withstands heavy sanding and grinding
  • Resin bond withstands high heat and pressure
  • Tough aluminum oxide abrasive mineral cuts fast and performs well on many substrates
  • Bands fit onto a rubber expander wheel attachment (sold separately) for use with a die grinder or rotary drill
    		•

entry.title: 3M AB80769 - 3M Cloth Spiral Band 747D, 1/2 in x 1 in, 60 X-weight, 100 per case AB80769 7100138163
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 0.63

[shortdesc]

3M Cloth Spiral Band 747D, 1/2 in x 1 in, 60 X-weight, 100 per case

  • The 3M™ Cloth Band 747D is a versatile abrasive that can be used to access inner and outer contours for grinding, sanding, and shaping on all metals, including stainless steel and nickel alloys, as well as wood and fibreglass
  • It conforms to contours to help you remove parting lines or seams, imperfections, and burrs.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Tube-shaped band fits inner and outer contours to remove parting lines, imperfections, and burrs
  • Ceramic/aluminum oxide blend offers excellent cut rate and life for increased performance over traditional abrasives when sanding on whitewood and metal substrates
  • Durable cotton backing withstands aggressive sanding and grinding
  • Grinding aid reduces grinding temperatures for processes involving heat-sensitive alloys such as stainless steel and nickel alloys
  • Resin bond withstands high heat and pressure
    		•

  • They are used for deburring holes and in close tolerance work areas.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Merit
    Diameter 5/16 Inch
    Grit 80
    Height 1-1/2 Inch
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide

  • tough and durable
  • Strong X-wt
  • cotton backing construction for extended durability and even wear
  • Good for flash removal, polishing, or removing machine tool marks and edge breaking on all types of metal
